SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into activity (aid, target, now, `start`, `end`, topic, director, contact, description, url) values (#{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{target,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{now,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{start,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{end,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{topic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{director,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update activity set aid = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, target = #{target,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, now = #{now,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, `start` = #{start,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `end` = #{end,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, topic = #{topic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, director = #{director,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, aid, target, now, `start`, `end`, topic, director, contact, description, url from activity where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, aid, target, now, `start`, `end`, topic, director, contact, description, url from activity
